key_risks: Market volatility and reduced demand for office space due to remote work trends
Tenant concentration risk with reliance on major tenants
Financial leverage and sensitivity to rising interest rates
controversies: Lack of transparency in ESG performance and sustainability initiatives
environmental_issues: Need for investments in green building practices to meet sustainability demands
social_issues: Potential reputational risks due to insufficient ESG disclosures
governance_issues: Reliance on debt financing and potential impact of rising interest rates on profitability

sources.title: Overview - Piedmont Office Realty Trust
sources.snippet: Piedmont Office Realty Trust, Inc. (NYSE: PDM), a self-administered and self-managed real estate investment trust (REIT), is one of the nation's largest publicly-traded owners of Class A office properties. Piedmont is focused on creating value for its shareholders through the acquisition, development, ownership and progressive management of premier properties primarily located in the Sunbelt.
